body.name: Kamado Joe KJ23NRHC Classic Joe II Stand Alone 18 inch Charcoal Grill, Blaze Red
features: Air Lift Hinge – The air lift hinge significantly reduces dome weight. The grill dome can be lifted with a single finger giving the most comfortable grilling experience there is.
Exclusive Divide & Conquer flexible cooking system multilevel, half-rack design doubles cooking space and frees you to cook different foods on different levels and on different cooking surfaces
Patented, all-aluminum, no-rust, rain-proof control tower top vent maintains consistent air setting for precise airflow management
All-new, double-thick wire mesh fiberglass gasket offers superior air-tight seal and 10 times the life of normal industry gaskets
New advanced multi-panel firebox six-piece design eliminates breakage
body.description: The Kamado Joe Classic II sets a new standard for craftsmanship & innovation. The Classic II features a thick-walled, heat-resistant shell that locks in smoke & moisture at any temperature. Beneath the easy-open lid, a large cooking surface crafted from commercial-grade 304 stainless steel provides ample space for 10-12 fillets or chicken breasts. Other standard features include the Divide & Conquer flexible cooking system, a precision ventilation dial & a patented slide-out ash drawer for easy access & cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CLASSIC II Our Most Popular Grill. The kamado that set a new high standard for craftsmanship and innovation.

Product Features KONTROL TOWER TOP VENT Precise temperature control AMP FIREBOX Advanced Multi-Piece Firebox retains heat & prevents breakage AIR LIFT HINGE Reduces dome weight - so you can lift it with a finger and stop it wherever you want.

FIBERGLASS MESH GASKET For an air-tight seal DIVIDE AND CONQUER Versatility in cooking with variation in temperature ranges & cooking surfaces STAINLESS STEEL LATCH Self-activating latch locks in heat and smoke for the perfect cook

GRILL COVER JOETISSERIE DOJOE COOKING SURFACES LUMP CHARCOAL Product Accessories Protect your investment Quiet-but-powerful motor can spin up to 20 pounds of food for 360° cooking Transform your grill into a pizza oven Versatility in cooking with cast iron grates, griddles, and soapstones 100% natural lump charcoal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the purchase - Reasons why...
reviews.reviewText: This is by far a great upgrade to my previous Big Green Egg. The big green egg I had for 25 years and it had been used at least several time a month since the time I bought it, worked great no problems. I was reading about the Kamado Joe and started looking into it. The reason I replaced my big green egg with the Kamado Joe was for these reasons, first it had a removable drawer for the ash easy to clean, the BGE you have to take the grate out and scrape out the ash with a small scoop. Second and this is main reason that I like the Kamado Joe is the split grill rack that are adjustable heights for variable cooking and the half circle ceramic plates. My BGE I did purchase a ceramic insert plate but it was a full circle plate which prevented the flames from burning the bottom of the grill, but I had to take out the grill and ceramic plate every time I need to add charcoal to the smoker for long cooks. The third reason is the main gasket it is made from a stainless steel mesh which last longer than the felt gasket than on the BGE and does not leak air inside which is easier to control the internal temperature. Finally the fourth reason is the pivoting hinge on the heavy top of the smoker that you can open with your finger. There is nothing wrong with the big green egg and I would still be using it today, but I really like these features of the Kamado Joe as I enjoy cooking with it and plan on having it for 25 plus years in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ceramic cooker
reviews.reviewText: I have used a big green egg for many years liked some features of this one, so when we moved I got one. Sure am happy I did! The mesh seal, locking top and ease of cleaning are big pluses. Haven’t had it too long but it seems to hold its temperature better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My most favorite Amazon purchase EVER... And it KILLS the BGE...
reviews.reviewText: I have spent a fortune on this dang site... But this Kamado Joe II and the JJ George Table are truly the most satisfying order I have ever made. I never really like the BGE, color, racking system, etc. But the Kamado Joe II solves all of those problems, totally...BGE started in 1972 - Last years estimated revenues were $80MKamado Joe started in 2009 - Last years estimated revenues were $60MThat tells you something there alone...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a great Kamado-style grill
reviews.reviewText: I love almost everything about this grill, with the exception of the latch mechanism. This was loose when I received the grill, and promptly fell apart. I was able (with difficulty) to re-assemble it, and now it works fine. The instructions for doing so were non-existent, so even after Googling and YouTubing, I had to just fiddle around with it until I figured it out. Otherwise, the grill is sturdy and well-made, and I am pleased with the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best grill ever
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had got one years ago

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best steaks ..... EVER!!
reviews.reviewText: So glad I ponied up the big bucks for this. Almost impossible to screw up a steak. Just watch any You Tube video on how to with this thing and you're cooking like a pro. One of my better choices so for in this life. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective upon delivery.
reviews.reviewText: My order arrived with the following parts defective or damaged:- The gasket had a tear in it.- The handle did not fit the bolt pattern in top cover.- The top cover black metal band was damaged and appears to have been patched and painted. This can be seen in photo attached just to the left of the handle bolt.Amazon has ordered me a replacement that will arrive in 10 days. Kamado Joe would not assist me in obtaining the needed replacement parts to repair myself. You can not reach Kamado Joe by telephone. I had to create a case and then they emailed me and advised that I would have to work with Amazon on the replacement. Amazon only solution was to replace the grill in its entirety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Kamado, bad quality if top vent materials.
reviews.reviewText: Top vent with paint burps after some months of use. The screw does not screw anymore. Bad quality, not what kamado joe should be.

First of all, fast delivery, correct and safe package and it's all included for start and cooking a lot of food. It's best ever grill that i ever seen and tryed. It's worth every cent! I would recommend to everyone who know how to live and eat.Slogan(not my own): If you know how to live, you will die for this grill.
